msbt.message: I had a great time hanging out the other day. I'm sending you a gift I wasn't able to give you then. I hope you enjoy it. And feel free to stop by for a workout sometime. My gym is always open!
It was so cool when you came by to visit me the other day. I'm so sorry that I didn't make you a protein shake! Oh well. Maybe next time.
It was so fun when you came over the other day. You know, sometimes I think I should just turn my home into a gym and recruit some workouters. Worker outers? Workoutees? I really like friends.

The other day was so much fun that I did chin-ups to burn off the extra energy. Oh, here's the thing you left behind. I was gonna bring it over myself, but the chin-ups kinda turned my arms into noodles.
